title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting SWT.MULTI in the SWT example ControlExample, the ControlExampleText component produces a beep sound.
EB: The ControlExampleText component should not produce a beep sound when choosing SWT.MULTI.
SR: Please investigate and fix the issue causing the ControlExampleText to beep when selecting SWT.MULTI. Additionally, ensure that selecting SWT.MULTI does not produce any unexpected sounds.
